unnormalised: ## Ace Your Exams with These Awesome Exam Prep Apps!
normalised: ## Ace Your Exams with These Awesome Exam Prep Apps!

unnormalised: Hey everyone! Exams stressing you out? We've all been there. Remember those all-nighters fueled by chai and instant noodles? Luckily, in this age of Education Technology (EdTech), things are getting easier. Forget lugging around heavy textbooks from NCERT; your phone is now your best friend!
normalised: Hey everyone! Exams stressing you out? We have all been there. Remember those all-nighters fueled by chai and instant noodles? Luckily, in this age of Education Technology (Ed Tech), things are getting easier. Forget lugging around heavy textbooks from N C E R T; your phone is now your best friend!

unnormalised: There's a whole universe of exam prep apps out there ready to help you crack those exams. Whether you're prepping for your Class 10 boards, JEE, NEET, or even a competitive exam like the UPSC, there's an app for you.
normalised: There is a whole universe of exam prep apps out there ready to help you crack those exams. Whether you are prepping for your Class ten boards, J E E, N E E T, or even a competitive exam like the U P S C, there is an app for you.

unnormalised: First up, check out apps offering personalized learning paths. They analyze your strengths and weaknesses, like your performance in Trigonometry vs. Algebra (we all have our demons, right?). These apps build a study plan tailored just for you. No more wasting time on topics you already know! Think of it as having your personal guru, like a digital Chanakya, guiding you.

unnormalised: Another must-have? Apps with tons of mock tests. Seriously, practice makes perfect! Simulate the real exam environment – same time pressure, same question format. That way, come exam day, you'll feel like you're just taking another test at home in your pajamas. Many even offer detailed solutions and explanations after each test.

unnormalised: Don't forget apps with interactive video lectures. Some even have awesome animation that make even the most boring topics (ahem, organic chemistry) a little more interesting. Imagine understanding complex concepts while munching on some delicious biryani – talk about a win-win!

unnormalised: And for those last-minute cramming sessions? Flashcard apps are a lifesaver. You can even create your own decks with all those important formulas and definitions. Plus, studying with friends is even easier – you can share flashcard decks and quiz each other remotely!

unnormalised: This Onam season, resolve to study smarter, not harder. Download a few of these apps, experiment, and find what works best for you. Good luck! You got this! Remember that cracking the exam is like scaling a mountain - one step at a time. Maybe 5-6 hrs per day with one of these apps is all it takes.
